I honestly think the Old Boys Club just wants her to fail and out the way

@highyield6 @anthony_einhorn In all fairness, so is every growth fund out there. $MACGX MOTLEY FOOLS TOP PICKS SLAUGHTER HOUSE 5, $VUG ETC ETC....growth is growth. I've yet to see 1 fund stop the bleeding.  Only 1 reason @POTUS @KamalaHarris #INCOMPETENCE

@highyield6 ARKK et al seems like a massive pump and dump scheme distributing crap companies to the masses. She was all over the press in 02/2021 at the top. Never felt like these funds were serious about their investment methodology or doing any meaningful due diligence.
